entry.title: My First Windows Phone App
entry.content:
I have been working on windows mobile for the last 10 years starting with VB 3.0 up to .NET. This is the first time I work on a consumer app. I have release an app called Skymusic. I found out that there are already another app named the same way.

I have been using Omina 7 with Windows Phone 7.5. I have found that from time to time I am not able to sync my medias over. I have lots of music I would like to put on my phone. The fatest way would be from a could storage since most of my stuff are there. However there are very few apps that offers download to local from could especially from skydrive. So I build a simple app that could just do that. The live SDK was not that suitable for a job like this, its does not handles continuos donwload well. It woul be fine if I let select one file at a time for download or may be stream it on demand. I wanted to used wifi and download all the files when I have a fsater connection.

After 3 or maybe 4 days, my apps was rejected. I had to make some changes using the tips from From Concept to Code in 6 hours: Shipping my first Windows Phone App 1. The app keep crashing when in continous download mode, I had to change the design to a click 1 item at time to download. 2. Replace my buttons with Coding4Fun Windows Phone Toolkit. 3. Replace screenshots I capture using print screen with the one I took using screenshots.cs” from the crazy-useful Jeff Wilcox. Resubmitted the app and it was approved, but I mistakenly select $6.99 for pricing. I made a website www.skymusicapp.com using the One-Page Windows Phone 7 App Website Template with rack static boilerplate and hosted it on heroku.

entry.title: Abstract Class Implementing Interface
entry.content:
Abstract Class Implementing Interface.

Recenlty I took a technically test and I have write an employee class for an aspx page that will use an abstract class that implements an Interface.

What is abstract class ? Abstract class is a base class or a parent class. Abstract classes can have empty abstract methods or it can have implemented methods which can be overridden by child classes.

What are interfaces? Interface is a contract class with empty methods, properties and functions. Any class which implements the interface has to compulsory implement all the empty methods, functions and properties of the interface.

Interface ` using System; using System.Collections.Generic; using System.Linq; using System.Web;

namespace Employee.Interface {

public interface IEmployee
{
    String Name
    {
        get;
        set;
    }

    String DateJoin
    {
        get;
        set;
    }

    String Department
    {
        get;
        set;
    }

    bool Save(String mName, String mDate, String mDepartment);
}

} `

Abstract Class

` using System; using System.Collections.Generic; using System.Linq; using System.Web; using Employee.Interface;

namespace Employee.Abstract {

public abstract class AEmployee:IEmployee
{
    public abstract String Name
    {
        get;
        set;
    }

    public abstract String DateJoin
    {
        get;
        set;
    }

    public abstract String Department
    {
        get;
        set;
    }

    public abstract bool Save(String mName, String mDate, String mDepartment);

}

} `

Employee Class ` using System; using System.Collections.Generic; using System.Linq; using System.Web; using Employee.Abstract;

namespace Employee {

public class Employee : AEmployee
{
    private String _Name = String.Empty;
    private String _DateJoin = String.Empty;
    private String _Department = String.Empty;

    public override String Name
    {
        get
        {

            return _Name;
        }
        set
        {
            _Name = value;
        }
    }

    public override String DateJoin
    {
        get
        {
            return _DateJoin;
        }
        set
        {
            _DateJoin = value;
        }
    }

    public override String Department
    {
        get
        {
            return _Department;
        }
        set
        {
            _Department = value;
        }
    }

    public override bool Save(String mName, String mDate, String mDepartment)
    {
        bool success = false;
        try
        {
            _Name = mName;
            _DateJoin = mDate;
            _Department = mDepartment;

            //Code to save 
            //
            success = true;
        }
        catch (Exception)
        {
            throw;
        }
        return success;
    }
}

} `

entry.title: Web-Based Kindle Cloud Reader
entry.content: Kindle apps for iPad is not available in a lot of countries like Singapore. The only way to get one is to sign in an US based iTunes account. Now there,s a cloud reader which is accessible any where via https://read.amazon.com.

entry.title: Yahoo mail release old deactivated email address
entry.content: Not sure how long it’s has been going on but Yahoo Mail release the lock on old deactivated email address. If you have ever deactivated an account with yahoo because of spam or whatever reason, you can register for the same username which is not possible last time.

entry.title: Ayschronous Data Loading
entry.content:
This code improves data loading for large database, very useful for windows applications which do not implement paging ffor data grids.

`private DataTable dt = null;

private void LoadGrid(object sender, DoWorkEventArgs e) {

dt = ...;

}

private void WorkerCompleted(object sender, RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs e) {

dgView.DataSource = dt;
dgView.AutoSizeColumnsMode = DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.AllCells;

}

private void LoadinBackground() {

System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker bgWrkr = new System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker();
bgWrkr.DoWork += new System.ComponentModel.DoWorkEventHandler(LoadGrid);
bgWrkr.RunWorkerCompleted += new System.ComponentModel.RunWorkerCompletedEventHandler(WorkerCompleted);
bgWrkr.RunWorkerAsync();

}`

entry.title: Request yahoo serach marketing to reissue cheque to my actual name instead of account name
entry.content: Sometime ago yahoo search marking was merge into mircosoft adcenter. Recently I receive a refund for one of my inactive account, totalling about $200 but it was issue to the account name created and not to my real name. Therefor I couldn’t cash the cheque. I log in to my account again trying find a email contact to ask to have the cheque reissue but all contact was remove except for a hotline number. I google and found the FAQ page which gave instructions on how to get my check reissue. http://advertisingcentral.yahoo.com/refund

entry.title: Grub rescue error
entry.content:
I used gpart to partition a 600g hard disk with preinstall win7. When I boot up after that, boot sector for win7 was gone or maybe replaced. The grup rescue command prompt appear. I couldn’t fix it. I simply install Linux and got a new boot menu.

When I migrate win7 to virtual box the same problem appear. This time I had to use win7 rescues disk to fix the problem. Below are the steps I found

  1. Put the Windows Vista installation disc in the disc drive, and then start the computer.
  2. Press a key when you are prompted.
  3. Select a language, a time, a currency, a keyboard or an input method, and then click Next.
  4. Click Repair your computer.
  5. Click the operating system that you want to repair, and then click Next.
  6. In the System Recovery Options dialog box, click Command Prompt.
  7. Type Bootrec.exe /FixMbr, and then press ENTER.

entry.title: VS2008 events handler
entry.content:
If you are using the Visual Studio IDE 2008 onwards, you will not find the event handlers by double clicking on the components or from the drop down box in code view.

You have to toto properties of that component and click the Events icon. You find all the event handlers there. Double-click the event that you want to create, for example the Load event.

entry.title: DVD Player Region Hack
entry.content:
I purchase a LG dvd player sometime ago. It was a display set on sale $300 for a $500 set. Recently, it somehow cold booted, and some DVD I bought cannot be played. A message “Wrong regional code”.

I google a bit and found that I could hack the region code.

I got the instruction from videohelp.com/dvdhacks 1. Press “Home key on Remote Control

  1. Using your cursor keys, move to “Setup” and press “Enter” on the RCU

  2. Move cursor to “Lock” icon using down arrow on Remote Control

  3. Press “Zero(0)” key on Remote Control 7 times (0-0-0-0-0-0-0)

A dialogue box with a message saying “Congratulations! Region Change Fee!”

I suspect my set was set to region free by the sales guys at the store when on display.

entry.title: Kindle Available For Sale Outside US
entry.content:
Finally…we get Kindle ship to us outside of US. Amazon introduces a new addition to the Kindle family of wireless reading devices: Kindle with U.S. and International Wireless. With this new Kindle, you can receive your books, newspapers, and magazines wirelessly while at home or abroad in over 100 countries. Whether you’re in New York, Paris, SÃ£o Paulo, Mumbai, Beijing, Tokyo, or Sydney, you can think of a book and be reading it in less than 60 seconds. The $279 Kindle with U.S. and International Wireless can be preordered today for delivery starting in two weeks.

Kindle utilizes the same 3G wireless technology as advanced cell phones, so you never need to hunt for a Wi-Fi hotspot. Unlike cell phones, there are no monthly wireless bills and no yearly contracts. There is no software to install, and no syncing required.

The 8” x 5.3” x 0.36” Kindle is as thin as most magazines and weighs less than a paperbackâ€”but can hold 1,500 books. Its electronic-ink screen looks and reads like real paper with no glareâ€”even in bright sunlight. A long battery life means you can read for up to two weeks on a single charge.

You can order one here

entry.title: Countdown Timer
entry.content:
If you have read Alex Mandossian’s Action steps, you know that he suggested that we watch our time using a count down time. Ever since I read this I have been looking for one. A physical countdown time is either too expensive or too small. So i developed one that will run on my screen and stay on top of all my applications. Now i can set a target for my self each time I start a new process.

You can down load the software here.

You may distribute it freely. please sent me some feedback after using it.

entry.title: My Beta Commentor Publish Notice WordPress Plugin
entry.content:
I am releasing a beta WordPress plugin, a Commentor Publish Notice emailer. My plugin sends email to all the people who have commented on the blog when a post is publish.

Installation Guide:

  1. Download the plugin here
  2. Unzip the file
  3. Upload the whole wizcom folder to your Plugins folder via FTP
  4. Inside the Plugins section of your WordPress control panel activate the plugin
  5. Under the Dashboard click on WizCom.
  6. Setup yoor email template.

Please report any bugs here.

entry.title: Clickbank direct deposit
entry.content:
Clickbank direct deposit is really great I got my paid out for March in 2 days and none of that expensive clearing fee. Comparing to my feburary cheaque payment, I receive it by mail last week and its still processing. I enjoying the shorter turn arond as now I have more funds to paly with. My latest paid out is about $600.  

The latest news from Clickbank, Now they do not allowing P2P products anymore. That means no more movies, music, PSP, iPod, Satellite TV for PC, Wii products.

entry.title: Portable Skype
entry.content:
I been a big fan of portable programs ever since I wipe out accidentally my firefox 2 years ago. I was looking for a way not to reinstall my applications and to make them go on my usb. I been using a couple of such program Firefox, Thunderbird, coreftp, putty, keeppass, xampp and many more. The latest addition is Skype. Download Squad show as how

  1. Install Skype on your PC and then find the installation folder. It’s probably something like “C:\Program Files\Skype.” Copy the Skype.exe file to a folder on your USB flash drive.  

  2. In that same folder on your flash drive, create a subfolder called “data.”

  3. Create a new text file called “Skype.bat” or Skype Portable.bat” or whatever you like.

  4. Open your new file using Notepad or another text editor and write “skype.exe /datapath:”data” /removable” (without the quotes).

  5. Save and close your file

entry.title: How to know if you are ready for your niche
entry.content: Your gone through some steps or routine to come to a conclusion on your niche for your website, blog or article campaign. You are all set and passionate about your niche and ready to unleash it on the www audiences. Now before you do that and possible end up with a dead campaign or blog, do a simple test to make sure you are ready for it. Write 20 articles on your niche without any references material, simply using your own words and knowledge. Once your are done spin 5 sub articles out each of this 20 articles. If you are able to do that you have a year worth of content and probably more. Now for a little link muscle. Use 20 on your blog and each of the 5 spin article on a sub domain blog linking to its main. For article campaign simple submit 20 articles to 1 main article directory and separate the 5 across an other directory linking to the main article. Now you have something worthwhile to keep going.

entry.title: Miracle Baby
entry.content:
I have read about his story on a local paper. His story was make known by Lee Chee Chew, creator of the comics strip CHEW ON IT!, published in The Sunday Times in Singapore. http://www.chewonitcomics.blogspot.com/

It’s a about a little boy that was bandoned at birth on July 15th, 2006, Thien Nhan was mauled by a wild animal, resulting in the loss of his entire right leg and genitals. In mid-March 2008 he was adopted by a Vietnamese family in Hanoi, and is now seeking sponsors to help pay for his medical care, rehabilitation and education. He’s a very smart, sweet-natured and bright little boy, who looks forward to learning to walk. Check out the blog  http://help-thien-nhan.blogspot.com/.

entry.title: Landing page
entry.content:
Building a landing page can be very confusing. I have studied many landing page website recently, and found that these model works really well.

  1. Use attractive pictures to attract more users to research the title.

  2. Analysis of potential customers pain and problems with the current services or product.

  3. sell the benefits of product or service not the features.

  4. Using a large number testimonials.

  5. Money back guarantee.

  6. Give additional benefits for customers who make immediately purchase.

  7. Build an opt-in list, its takes 7 follow up to make a sale.
